title: What Is in the Box?
description: In What Is in the Box?, a boy takes a box to be mailed. Find out where the box goes and what happens to it along the way. Repetitive text, supportive pictures, and high-frequency words make this book perfect for emerging readers.
reviewWords: box, knocks, smashed, stamped, torn, tossed
wordWork: Alliteration                : Recognize alliteration with the /b/ sound
